mainSubject: GPX and Viper V3 PRO mouse ergonomics
positives: Ergonomics are better on the Viper V3 PRO
Rear portion and side grip are improved
painPoints: GPX shape feels like holding a potato
Front hump is intrusive on knuckles
improvementSuggestions: Redesign GPX shape for better hand feel

positives: Good compromise between control and speed

mainSubject: Material quality of Viper V3 Pro mouse
painPoints: Feels cheap due to lightweight design
improvementSuggestions: Improve material feel without adding too much weight
